text: Wa Akhtara Musa Qawmahu Sab`ina Rajulaan Limiqatina Falamma 'Akhadhat/humu Ar-Rajfatu Qala Rabbi Law Shi'ta 'Ahlaktahum Min Qablu Wa 'Iyaya 'Atuhlikuna Bima Fa`ala As-Sufaha'u Minna 'In Hiya 'Illa Fitnatuka TuÄ‘illu Biha Man Tasha'u Wa Tahdi Man Tasha'u 'Anta Waliyuna Faghfir Lana Wa Arhamna Wa 'Anta Khayru Al-Ghafirina
